definition: to stop using/to abandon/abandoned/deprecated
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Provision or retire infrastructure as required.
sentences.chinese: 需要规定或者弃用基础。

sentences.english: You can ignore warnings about deprecated functions.
sentences.chinese: 可以忽略关于弃用功能的警告。

sentences.english: Deprecated functions will continue to work.
sentences.chinese: 弃用功能将会继续工作。

sentences.english: Yardsticks seldom are discarded while yielding favorable readings.
sentences.chinese: 在产生良好的读数时，衡量尺度极少被弃用。

sentences.english: You might see warnings in the task list about functions that have been deprecated. These warnings are usually in the following format
sentences.chinese: 您可能看到任务列表中关于已被弃用功能的警告。

definition: to exchange/to replace/to substitute for/to switch
to replace sb (personnel, sports team player etc)/substitution
to rotate/to take turns/to switch
to replace/to supersede/to supplant/(chemistry) substitution
to exchange (sth) for (sth else)/to replace with/to convert into
to replace
to denounce/to castigate
to replace (a worn-out tire etc)/to change (one's address etc)
on stage/to go on stage/to take the field
to snub/to consign to the trash heap of history
substitute
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
first issue/first public showing
to suffer/to meet with (sth unfortunate)
not good
the end/to conclude
to leave (the stage, an exam room, the playing field etc)/to take part in some activity/to take an examination (in the imperial examination system)
